subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: When Brazil lost to Germany, 7-1, on Tuesday, it lost something much larger than a game in a country where pride over five previous World Cup championships is forged into the national identity.
snippet: When Brazil lost to Germany, 7-1, on Tuesday, it lost something much larger than a game in a country where pride over five previous World Cup championships is forged into the national identity.
